testcase.classname: Testing the API endpoint with RestAssured
testcase.name: Verify & Find the pet id
testcase.system-out: When I send a Get request to get response code for petstore endpoint........passed Then the response body should contains correct Response body................passed And The Response Status code should be 200..................................passed

testcase.classname: Testing the API endpoint with RestAssured
testcase.name: Create a new response code
testcase.system-out: When I send a post request to create response body for petstore endpoint....passed Then the response body should contains created Response body """ {"name":"bird"} """.passed And The Response Status code should be created with expected code 405.......passed

testcase.classname: Testing the API endpoint with RestAssured
testcase.name: Update the pet id & Name
testcase.system-out: When I send a Put request to update response body for petstore endpoint.....passed Then the response body should contains updated Response body """ {"name":"puppy"} """.passed And The Response Status code should be updated with expected code 405.......passed

testcase.classname: Testing the API endpoint with RestAssured
testcase.name: Remove the response code
testcase.system-out: When I send a Delete request to delete response code for petstore endpoint..passed Then The Response Status code should be deleted with expected code 405......passed
